text.div:
IV Fluids Required for Grade 3 or Higher Diarrhea

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://www.nlm.nih.gov/research/umls/rxnorm
    Code Display
    1795344 500 ML Glucose 50 MG/ML / Sodium Chloride 9 MG/ML Injection
    1795346 1000 ML Glucose 50 MG/ML / Sodium Chloride 9 MG/ML Injection
    1795348 250 ML Glucose 50 MG/ML / Sodium Chloride 9 MG/ML Injection
    309778 Glucose 50 MG/ML Injectable Solution
    313002 Sodium Chloride 9 MG/ML Injectable Solution
    847630 Calcium Chloride 0.0014 MEQ/ML / Potassium Chloride 0.004 MEQ/ML / Sodium Chloride 0.103 MEQ/ML / Sodium Lactate 0.028 MEQ/ML Injectable Solution

name: IV Fluids Required for Grade 3 or Higher Diarrhea
